content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":221992,"originalJapaneseLine":"この強大な悪魔を前にあなたは……","translatedEnglishLine":"Before this mighty demon, you..."},{"lineNumber":221993,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは渾身の力を振り絞り戦おうとしたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"You tried to muster all your strength to fight,"},{"lineNumber":221994,"originalJapaneseLine":"残念、最早手を上げることすら出来なかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"But unfortunately, you could no longer even raise your hand."},{"lineNumber":221995,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはアイテムを使って","translatedEnglishLine":"You tried to use an item"},{"lineNumber":221996,"originalJapaneseLine":"この場を切り抜けようとしたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"to get out of this situation,"},{"lineNumber":221997,"originalJapaneseLine":"残念、使えそうなアイテムがない。","translatedEnglishLine":"But unfortunately, there was no usable item."},{"lineNumber":221998,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは必死になって逃げようとしたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"You desperately tried to run away,"},{"lineNumber":221999,"originalJapaneseLine":"残念、体をよじらせる程度のことしか出来なかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"But unfortunately, you could only manage to twist your body slightly."},{"lineNumber":222000,"originalJapaneseLine":"『抵抗は無意味だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"'Resistance is futile."},{"lineNumber":222001,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あるがままを受け入れろ』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Accept things as they are.'"},

{"lineNumber":222002,"originalJapaneseLine":"『クエルプランを退ける力……","translatedEnglishLine":"'The power to repel Quelpuran..."},

{"lineNumber":222003,"originalJapaneseLine":"　非常に興味がある』","translatedEnglishLine":"I am very interested.'"},

{"lineNumber":222004,"originalJapaneseLine":"『貴様は我と共に来てもらうぞ……","translatedEnglishLine":"'You will come with me..."},

{"lineNumber":222005,"originalJapaneseLine":"　クク、研究すれば何かに使えよう』","translatedEnglishLine":"Heh heh, if I study you, you might be useful for something.'"},

{"lineNumber":222006,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスの手があなたを掴もうと開かれる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Neplacus's hand opened to grab you."},

{"lineNumber":222007,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、あなたは抵抗することが出来ずにいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"But you were unable to resist."},

{"lineNumber":222008,"originalJapaneseLine":"『ぐうっ！？』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Guh!?'"},

{"lineNumber":222009,"originalJapaneseLine":"バイ・ロードの赤い光が閃き、","translatedEnglishLine":"A red light from the By-Road flashed,"},

{"lineNumber":222010,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスの瞳に矢が突き刺さる。","translatedEnglishLine":"and an arrow pierced Neplacus's eye."},

{"lineNumber":222011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「テメェ……うちの弟に何してやがる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You... what do you think you're doing to my little brother...?\""},{"lineNumber":222012,"originalJapaneseLine":"「テメェ……うちの妹に何してやがる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You... what do you think you're doing to my little sister...?\""},{"lineNumber":222013,"originalJapaneseLine":"「僕の弟に汚い手で触れてくれるなよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't touch my little brother with your filthy hands."},{"lineNumber":222014,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悪魔が」","translatedEnglishLine":"You demon.\""},{"lineNumber":222015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「僕の妹に汚い手で触れてくれるなよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't touch my little sister with your filthy hands."},{"lineNumber":222016,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悪魔が」","translatedEnglishLine":"You demon.\""},{"lineNumber":222017,"originalJapaneseLine":"『羽虫が……","translatedEnglishLine":"'Insects..."},{"lineNumber":222018,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだいたのか……』","translatedEnglishLine":"Still exist...'"},{"lineNumber":222019,"originalJapaneseLine":"『気炎を上げたところで、","translatedEnglishLine":"'No matter how much you raise your spirits,"},{"lineNumber":222020,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最早、死にかけの体であること、","translatedEnglishLine":"it doesn't change the fact that your body is already near death,"},{"lineNumber":222021,"originalJapaneseLine":"　変わりはあるまい……』","translatedEnglishLine":"does it...'"},{"lineNumber":222022,"originalJapaneseLine":"「チッ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch...\""},{"lineNumber":222023,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……くっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...ugh\""},{"lineNumber":222024,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンスと乱義の二人は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Zans and Rangi, the two of them,"},

{"lineNumber":222025,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう立っているのもやっとだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"were barely able to stand."},

{"lineNumber":222026,"originalJapaneseLine":"『良かろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"'Very well."},

{"lineNumber":222027,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それほど死が望みなら……』","translatedEnglishLine":"If you desire death that much...'"},

{"lineNumber":222028,"originalJapaneseLine":"『永遠の煉獄に落としてくれるわ！』","translatedEnglishLine":"'I will cast you into eternal purgatory!'"},

{"lineNumber":222029,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっと待ちな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait just a moment!\""},

{"lineNumber":222030,"originalJapaneseLine":"『む、この声は！？』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hm, this voice!?'"},

{"lineNumber":222031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪魔ネプラカス……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Demon Neplacus...\""},

{"lineNumber":222032,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前はまた、今回も……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You again, this time too..."},

{"lineNumber":222033,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっちゃいけないことをしたな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You've done something you shouldn't have...\""},

{"lineNumber":222034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それが何か分かるか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Do you know what that means?\""},{"lineNumber":222035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},

{"lineNumber":222036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺の身内に手を出した罪だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You have committed the sin of laying hands on my kin!\""},

{"lineNumber":222037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「テメェは今日――ここで殺す！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll kill you here and now today!\""},

{"lineNumber":222038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおおおおおおおおおおお！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uoooooooohhhhhhhh!\""},

{"lineNumber":222039,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大な大剣の重さなど感じさせない","translatedEnglishLine":"With the weight of the huge greatsword unnoticed,"},

{"lineNumber":222040,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスの嵐のような猛攻に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance struck with a storm of fierce attacks,"},

{"lineNumber":222041,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスは防戦を強いられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"forcing Neplacus to be on the defensive."},

{"lineNumber":222042,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあさあ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, come on!"},

{"lineNumber":222043,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもの威勢はどうした！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where's your usual spirit!?\""},{"lineNumber":222044,"originalJapaneseLine":"『グウウウ……！』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Guuu...!'"},

{"lineNumber":222045,"originalJapaneseLine":"『生意気ナ！　生意気ナ！　生意気ナァァァ！』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Impudent! Impudent! Impuuudent!'"},

{"lineNumber":222046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわっ……改めて見ても……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow... even seeing it again..."},

{"lineNumber":222047,"originalJapaneseLine":"　つ、強ぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"S-strong...\""},{"lineNumber":222048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの悪魔と同等……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"On par with that demon...\""},

{"lineNumber":222049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿、どこ見てんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fool, what are you looking at?"},

{"lineNumber":222050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　むしろ押してやがる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're the one who's pushing him back...\""},

{"lineNumber":222051,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦いを片時も見逃すまいとするように、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if determined not to miss a moment of the battle,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この強大な悪魔を前にあなたは……
あなたは渾身の力を振り絞り戦おうとしたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You tried to muster all your strength to fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念、最早手を上げることすら出来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But unfortunately, you could no longer even raise your hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはアイテムを使って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You tried to use an item

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この場を切り抜けようとしたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to get out of this situation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念、使えそうなアイテムがない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But unfortunately, there was no usable item.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは必死になって逃げようとしたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You desperately tried to run away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念、体をよじらせる程度のことしか出来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But unfortunately, you could only manage to twist your body slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『抵抗は無意味だ。
あるがままを受け入れろ』
『クエルプランを退ける力……
非常に興味がある』
『貴様は我と共に来てもらうぞ……
クク、研究すれば何かに使えよう』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh, if I study you, you might be useful for something.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスの手があなたを掴もうと開かれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neplacus's hand opened to grab you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、あなたは抵抗することが出来ずにいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you were unable to resist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ぐうっ！？』
バイ・ロードの赤い光が閃き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A red light from the By-Road flashed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスの瞳に矢が突き刺さる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and an arrow pierced Neplacus's eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェ……うちの弟に何してやがる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You... what do you think you're doing to my little brother...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェ……うちの妹に何してやがる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You... what do you think you're doing to my little sister...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「僕の弟に汚い手で触れてくれるなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't touch my little brother with your filthy hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔が」
「僕の妹に汚い手で触れてくれるなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't touch my little sister with your filthy hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔が」
『羽虫が……
まだいたのか……』
『気炎を上げたところで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'No matter how much you raise your spirits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最早、死にかけの体であること、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it doesn't change the fact that your body is already near death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変わりはあるまい……』
ザンスと乱義の二人は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zans and Rangi, the two of them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう立っているのもやっとだった。
『良かろう。
それほど死が望みなら……』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you desire death that much...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『永遠の煉獄に落としてくれるわ！』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I will cast you into eternal purgatory!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっと待ちな！」
『む、この声は！？』
「悪魔ネプラカス……」
「お前はまた、今回も……
やっちゃいけないことをしたな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've done something you shouldn't have..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それが何か分かるか？」
「俺の身内に手を出した罪だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have committed the sin of laying hands on my kin!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェは今日――ここで殺す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll kill you here and now today!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおおおおおおおおお！」
巨大な大剣の重さなど感じさせない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the weight of the huge greatsword unnoticed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスの嵐のような猛攻に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance struck with a storm of fierce attacks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスは防戦を強いられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forcing Neplacus to be on the defensive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあさあ！
いつもの威勢はどうした！？」
『グウウウ……！』
『生意気ナ！　生意気ナ！　生意気ナァァァ！』
「うわっ……改めて見ても……
つ、強ぇ……」
「あの悪魔と同等……」
「馬鹿、どこ見てんだ。
むしろ押してやがる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the one who's pushing him back..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いを片時も見逃すまいとするように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if determined not to miss a moment of the battle,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

{"lineNumber":222043,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもの威勢はどうした！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where's your usual spirit!?\""},{"lineNumber":222044,"originalJapaneseLine":"『グウウウ……！』","translatedEnglishLine":"'Guuu...!'"},

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それが何か分かるか？」
「俺の身内に手を出した罪だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have committed the sin of laying hands on my kin!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェは今日――ここで殺す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll kill you here and now today!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおおおおおおおおお！」
巨大な大剣の重さなど感じさせない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the weight of the huge greatsword unnoticed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスの嵐のような猛攻に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance struck with a storm of fierce attacks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスは防戦を強いられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forcing Neplacus to be on the defensive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあさあ！
いつもの威勢はどうした！？」
『グウウウ……！』
『生意気ナ！　生意気ナ！　生意気ナァァァ！』
「うわっ……改めて見ても……
つ、強ぇ……」
「あの悪魔と同等……」
「馬鹿、どこ見てんだ。
むしろ押してやがる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the one who's pushing him back..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いを片時も見逃すまいとするように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if determined not to miss a moment of the battle,
